text:
@realDonaldTrump After November 3rd, this is in the history books.

* President with the help of Russia
* Organized crime
* Rape
* You killed over 100,000 people in covid-19
* You calls for violence and glorify violence
* Protests in US and other countries

And the new president is Joe Biden
